hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Spirit Temple#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Forest Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.
